body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, my name is Elijah Price from AutoPro Solutions. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hello, Elijah. My name is Olivia Roberts.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: It's nice to meet you, Olivia. Can you kindly provide me with your phone number so we can reach out to you?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my phone number is five five five six one two three four.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Olivia. And may I also have your email address, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, my email address is olivia.roberts@example.com.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Perfect, I have noted down your contact details. Is there anything else I can assist you with today, Olivia?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Not at the moment, Elijah. I am satisfied with the service provided.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great to hear that, Olivia. Thank you for your time. If you have any questions in the future, feel free to reach out. Have a wonderful day!

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Thank you, Elijah. You have a great day too! Goodbye.
